summary.para: Converts an image to JPEG or bitmap (BMP) image format.

param.name: pShellItem
param.para: The Shell Item for the image to convert.

param.name: uiMaxWidth
param.para: The requested height in pixels. Should be less than or equal to the actual height of the original image. See Remarks.

param.name: uiMaxHeight
param.para: The requested width in pixels. Should be less than or equal to the actual width of the original image. See Remarks.

param.name: flags
param.para: Convert the image to BMP format.
Convert the image to JPEG format.

param.name: pvImage
param.para: A stream to receive the converted image. The stream must be created by the calling code prior to calling TranscodeImage.

param.name: puiWidth
param.para: The actual width of the converted image.

param.name: puiHeight
param.para: The actual height of the converted image.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: The aspect ratio of the original image is preserved. The new image is resized so that it will fit into a box of width uiMaxWidth and height uiMaxHeight.
The image size will not be changed if the original image already fits in this bounding box.
If both uiMaxWidth and uiMaxHeight are zero, the returned image will be the same size as the original.

summary.para: Exposes a method that allows conversion to JPEG or bitmap (BMP) image formats from any image type supported by Windows.
